title: 1981 Allan Cup
text:
The 1981 Allan Cup was the <a href="Canada">Canadian</a> national <a href="senior%20ice%20hockey">senior ice hockey</a> championship for the 1980-81 Senior "A" season. The event was hosted by the <a href="Thunder%20Bay%20Twins">Thunder Bay Twins</a> in <a href="Thunder%20Bay">Thunder Bay</a>, <a href="Ontario">Ontario</a>. The 1981 tournament marked the 73rd time that the <a href="Allan%20Cup">Allan Cup</a> has been awarded.
Results.
Round Robin
Semi-final
Final
